mng: straight, upright, proper, main, principal, to correct, to rectify, exactly, just (at that time), right (in that place), (math.) positive
first month of the lunar year

exm.mng: main text (as opposed to footnotes), main body (of a book)
first month of the lunar year
just at (that time), right in (that place), right in the middle of (doing sth)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated), precisely, exactly, even, if, just like, in the same way as
to point out mistakes or weak points for correction, to comment, criticism
